BasicInfo.short: Anvato is a video software platform that creates multiple adaptive bitrate streams for uninterrupted playback on any device or website.

Products.name: Live Capture Editor
Products.description: Live Capture Editor was added to CrunchBase in 2012

Products.name: Media Content Platform
Products.description: Media Content Platform was added to CrunchBase in 2011

Products.name: Anvato Premium Syndication
Products.description: The most powerful and flexible solution for distributing premium video content to the top video distribution portals

Products.name: ContentID
Products.description: Content ID offers unmatched accuracy through its Perceptual Signature technology that emulates human vision by identifying scenes, objects
